original_title: CBSL announces official USD exchange rates for today
original_body_lines: The Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL) has announced the official US dollar exchange rates for Tuesday (March 21).
Thereby, the buying rate is declared as Rs. 316.84 per US dollar, while the selling rate was recorded at Rs. 334.93 per US dollar.
Meanwhile, the Middle Rate of the USD/LKR SPOT exchange rate stood at Rs. 335.08 today.
